subject: Charged twice for December subscription!
body: Hi, I just noticed I was charged $49.99 TWICE on December 5th for my subscription. This is ridiculous! I want a refund immediately. My transaction ID is TXN-12345678.

subject: Can't access my account
body: Hello, I forgot my password and can't log in to my account. I've tried the reset link but it's not working. Can you help me regain access? My email is jane.smith@company.com.

subject: Feature Request: API Rate Limiting
body: Hi team! Love your product so far. One thing that would be really helpful is configurable rate limiting for the API. Currently it's too restrictive for our use case. Could you consider adding this feature? Thanks!
